scripts.dev: hdc rport tcp:8083 tcp:8083 && concurrently "react-native start" "npx hdc-server"
scripts._recreate-hvigor-plugin: cd ../react-native-harmony-hvigor-plugin && npm i && npm run deploy && cd ../tester
scripts.install:local-core: npm uninstall @react-native-oh/react-native-core && cd ../../../react-native-core/packages/react-native && yarn pack --filename package.tgz && cd ../../../../react-native-harmony/react-native-harmony && npm uninstall @react-native-oh/react-native-core && npm i @react-native-oh/react-native-core@file:../../../react-native-core/packages/react-native/package.tgz -D && cd ../tester && npm i @react-native-oh/react-native-core@file:../../../react-native-core/packages/react-native/package.tgz && npm i
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:cpp
scripts.format:cpp:check: CLANG_PATH=$(find $DEVECO_SDK_HOME -name 'clang-format' -type f | head -n 1) && npm run --silent _find-changed-files:cpp | sed 's#^#../#' | xargs $CLANG_PATH --dry-run --Werror --style=file:../../.clang-format
scripts._find-changed-files:cpp: npm run _find-changed-files | grep -E '\.(h|cpp)$' | grep -v '/generated/' | grep -v '/third-party/' | grep -v '/patches/'
scripts._find-changed-files: { git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d $(git rev-list --exclude $(git branch --show-current) --branches -1) HEAD; git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d; git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d --cached; } | sort | uniq
scripts.test:e2e: clear && kill-port 8082 && hdc rport tcp:8082 tcp:8082 && npm start -- --port 8082 > /dev/null & npm run harmony && npm run _build:test-e2e && npm run _install:test-e2e && npm run _open:test-e2e && kill-port 8082 && echo "\033[1;42mE2E: PASS\033[0m" || (kill-port 8082 && echo "\033[1;41mE2E: FAIL\033[0m" && exit 1)
scripts.test:links: npx markdown-link-check ../README.md && find ../docs -name '*.md' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 npx markdown-link-check
scripts._build:test-e2e: cd ./harmony && $DEVECO_SDK_HOME/../tools/node/bin/node $DEVECO_SDK_HOME/../tools/hvigor/bin/hvigorw.js --mode module -p module=entry@ohosTest -p isOhosTest=true -p buildMode=test assembleHap --analyze=normal --parallel --incremental --daemon && cd ..
scripts._open:test-e2e: hdc shell aa test -b com.rnoh.tester -m entry_test -s unittest OpenHarmonyTestRunner -s class tester -s timeout 60000 | grep -q "Error: [1-9]\|Failure: [1-9]\|Error in" && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.ci: npm run verify && npm run test:e2e && echo '\SUCCESS'
scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit && npm run lint:js && npm run format:cpp:check && npm run check:deprecations
